title: FIFA Fan Fest
summary: The FIFA Fan Fests are public viewing events organized by FIFA and the Host Cities during FIFA World Cup. FIFA Fan Fests followed the success of public viewing at 2002 FIFA World Cup in South Korea and became an essential part of the tournament since 2006 FIFA World Cup in Germany. Fan Fests take place in iconic locations of the Host Cities and feature broadcasts of football matches on giant screens, live concerts, parties, food, beverages and other activities and entertainment.
